description: Unit test specifications for the Angular AppComponent, testing creation, title property, and rendering.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Setup function to configure testing module before each test.

methods.name: should create the app
methods.description: Test to verify that the AppComponent can be instantiated.

methods.description: Test to verify that the AppComponent has the correct title property.

methods.name: should render title
methods.description: Test to verify that the component renders the expected title in the DOM.
